sentences.en: a wave of nostalgia for how great life was in the 1960s
sentences.cn: 一阵对20世纪60年代美好生活的强烈怀旧之情

sentences.en: He discerned in the novel an air of Sixties nostalgia.
sentences.cn: 他在小说里感受到一种20世纪60年代的怀旧氛围。

sentences.en: He looked back on his university days with a certain amount of nostalgia.
sentences.cn: 他带着一点留恋，回忆起大学时光。

sentences.en: He might be influenced by nostalgia for his happy youth.
sentences.cn: 也许是对年轻时幸福时光的怀恋影响了他。

sentences.en: He might be influenced by nostalgia for the surroundings of his happy youth.
sentences.cn: 他也许被他对快乐青年时代的环境的怀念影响了。

sentences.en: His portrait of Templeton is at times suffused in an atmosphere of sentimental nostalgia.
sentences.cn: 在他对坦普尔顿的描绘中不时流露出一种感伤怀旧的情绪.

sentences.en: I think of August 1991 with great tenderness and nostalgia.
sentences.cn: 回想起1991年8月,我心中充满了留恋.

sentences.en: Many people look back with nostalgia to feudal times.
sentences.cn: 许多人留恋不舍地回顾封建时代.

sentences.en: May nostalgia blossom! Long live our happy golden era!
sentences.cn: 五月怀旧开花! 向我们的幸福黄金时代万岁!

sentences.en: Nostalgia is, in the end, a seductive and sentimental fib.
sentences.cn: 怀旧最终不过是种诱人的、多情的谎言.

sentences.en: Our car had to be obviously sporty and distinctively styled , with just a dash of nostalgia.
sentences.cn: 我们的车当然要象跑车,车型要别树一帜, 还要有一点怀旧的色彩.

sentences.en: Rain coming here wrapped into a line, pestering us nostalgia this world.
sentences.cn: 雨到了这里缠成线, 缠着我们留恋人世间.

sentences.en: Returning to Chicago's Chinatown is always full of nostalgia for me.
sentences.cn: 再回到芝加哥的唐人街于我而言已饱含怀旧的意味.

sentences.en: She wallows in nostalgia for the past.
sentences.cn: 她沉湎于对过去的怀恋.

sentences.en: The images provoked strong surges of nostalgia for the days of yore.
sentences.cn: 这些影像勾起了对昔日时光的强烈怀念。

sentences.en: There is an unmistakable note of nostalgia in his voice when he looks back on the early years of the family business.
sentences.cn: 他回忆早些年的家族生意时，无疑是带着一种怀旧的语气的。

sentences.en: Today they are viewed a little more favourably and with some nostalgia.
sentences.cn: 今天,对待它们的态度就友善多了,而且还夹杂着一些怀旧色彩.

sentences.en: Wistfully, I look on those days with a feeling of nostalgia.
sentences.cn: 我真地对那段日子有一种怀旧之情.

trans.tran_en: Nostalgia is an affectionate feeling you have for the past, especially for a particularly happy time
